Row 36 VACCINATED: You need to record whether the child was vaccinated or not. Enter ‘Y’ or ‘N’ in the ‘vaccinated’ column. BATCH_EXPIRY_DATE: must be blank BATCH_NUMBER: must be blank ANATOMICAL_SITE: must be blank REASON_NOT_VACCINATED: Enter a valid reason
Row 37 CARE_SETTING: Enter a valid care setting.
Row 39 BATCH_NUMBER: must be at most 100 characters long
